title: Module import declarations
summary: Import all exported packages of a module with a single declaration.
explanation: Module import declarations let you import everything a module exports with one line. This is especially useful for java.base which covers collections, I/O, streams, and more.

whyModernWins.title: One line
whyModernWins.desc: Replace a wall of imports with a single module import.

whyModernWins.title: Module-aware
whyModernWins.desc: Leverages the module system to import coherent sets of packages.

whyModernWins.title: Quick starts
whyModernWins.desc: Perfect for scripts and prototypes where import lists are tedious.
